matches.version: (?-mix:Infinity Site Configuration<\/title>\s+<body bgcolor=white link=blue text=black vlink=maroon>\s+<center>\s+<p align=right>Version: ([^\s^<]+)<\/p>)
(?-mix:\s+Main Menu<\/title>\s+<body bgcolor=white link=blue text=black vlink=maroon>\s+<p align=right>Version: ([^\s^<]+)<\/p>)

matches.account: (?-mix:<input type=hidden name=setupItem\[\] value="\$cpassword"><input type=hidden name=setupTitle\[\] value="iSite Controller Password"><input name=setupValue\[\] value="([^\"^>]+)" size=40><\/td><\/tr>)
